about_the_game:
Factory Company

This game is a factory management simulation game that tests your creativity and strategic planning. Players establish and operate their own factories, aiming to succeed in an industrial market full of challenges and opportunities. The game offers a unique experience through its four main features:

Market Fluidity: At the heart of this game is a real-time changing economic market. Prices of goods fluctuate based on demand, supply, and inventory status, requiring players to predict and sell their products at the best possible time to maximize profit. Market analysis and strategic thinking are key to success.

Stocks and Loans: Step into the world of finance. Players can generate income by investing in the stock market or secure funds through loans when necessary. However, the interest on loans can negatively affect the profitability of your factory, so careful decision-making is essential. Financial management skills are put to the test.

Research: Technological innovation is essential to stay ahead in the competition. Unlock new items and develop new production lines through research. Continuous research and development are the surest way to elevate your factory to the top of the world.

Events: The market is filled with unpredictable events. Economic recessions, wars, economic booms, and various other events that can significantly impact the market appear throughout the game. These events provide players with the opportunity to actively respond and adjust their strategies, turning crises into opportunities.

All these elements combined, players must utilize various skills, including management strategy, market analysis, financial management, and technological innovation, to successfully operate their factory. Unleash your creativity, devise strategies, and compete against rivals to build the world’s top factory. This game goes beyond simple simulation to offer a genuine experience of being an entrepreneur.
